word:
Before coming here I occupied a house in Granville, a suburb of Sydney, near Parramatta. This house was a large and beautiful mansion, situated in 


                                   -328- 

a healthy locality. It was advertised to let [A BRITISH TERM MEANING, "FOR RENT."] for two pounds per week, but hard times came and we were able to get it for $5.76 per week. I think we lived in this house about two years.
